comment: very easy class, easy grader, just a bunch of reading worksheets (3 a week) plus a discussion post due every week. it was a quarter long class so the workload was more than regular classes but you start getting the hang of the reading worksheets so they become easier to do. I liked the class, No tests or quizzes! Final was optional!! (:

Easy grader but she never posted assignments on time. She said they would be posted the Thursday the week before and the assignments were not uploaded until Tuesday the week that they are due. She wouldn't upload until Tues and would have stuff do that day. She did hand out 100's which was nice but it was way too much work to not be posted on time.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Caring
